name: CupertinoTextMagnifier
desc: A [CupertinoMagnifier] used for magnifying text in cases where a user's finger may be blocking the point of interest, like a selection handle.

fields.name: animationCurve
fields.desc: The curve used for the in / out animations.

fields.name: dragResistance
fields.desc: A drag resistance on the downward Y position of the lens.

fields.name: hideBelowThreshold
fields.desc: The difference in Y between the gesture position and the caret center so that the magnifier hides itself.

fields.name: horizontalScreenEdgePadding
fields.desc: The padding on either edge of the screen that any part of the magnifier cannot exist past.

fields.name: magnifierInfo
fields.desc: [CupertinoTextMagnifier] will determine its own positioning based on the [MagnifierInfo] of this notifier.
